abstract: Motorola’s co-chief executive says the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who pressured the company into a planned spin-off of its cellphone handset business, has been “a force for good.”
snippet: Motorola’s co-chief executive says the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, who pressured the company into a planned spin-off of its cellphone handset business, has been “a force for good.”
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has been called a lot of things during his career of pressuring corporate boards and executives. On Wednesday, Sanjay Jha, the co-chief executive of Motorola, called Mr. Icahn “a force for good” at his company.

headline.main: Motorola’s Co-Chief Calls Icahn ‘a Force for Good’
